job description:
The Role: Our Data Science Team is Expanding!

We are looking for Data Scientists at all levels. Apply today to be considered for:

Data Scientist - You have a strong academic background and 1+ years of experience in Data Science or a related field.

Senior Data Scientist - You have spent 3+ years working as a Data Scientist and have knowledge of many Data Science concepts. You are able to work independently on projects and interact with the business to champion data science techniques.

Lead Data Scientist You bring 5+ years of Data Science experience and a mastery of concepts. You are able to train/mentor junior Data Scientists and may have managed or lead a team. You are able to communicate with senior level business leaders with confidence.

The Location: Charlottesville or Richmond, VA

The Team:

The Data Science team is tasked with transforming S&P Global Market Intelligences products and operations using machine learning and related data science techniques. We partner with business leaders to find new opportunities, implement solutions with the latest data science tools and technologies, and partner with engineering teams to deploy solutions into production software systems.

The Impact:

In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on a diverse range of data science projects that deliver creative, data-driven insights and novel data products that take on high-impact business problems for both the companys customers and internal partners.

Whats in it for you:

We are a Fortune 500 company and recognized industry-leading provider of data and analytics; as such, we provide an unusually rich environment for data scientists to make an impact and grow personally and professionally. In addition to applying data science, you will have an opportunity to help establish the strategies and methodologies for a growing data science team.

Responsibilities:
  • Design, execute and deploy projects aimed at solving high-impact business problems using machine learning, natural language processing, and related data science techniques
  • Play a central role in all stages of the data science project life cycle, including (1) identification of suitable data science project opportunities, (2) partnering with business leaders, domain experts, and end-users to gain business understanding, data understanding, and collect requirements, (3) data preparation, (4) data analysis and modeling, (5) evaluation/interpretation of results and presentation to business leaders, and (6) partnering with software development teams to deploy models/algorithms into production systems, when applicable
  • Prepare the exploratory data analyses, proof-of-concept modeling, and business cases necessary to generate partner consensus and internal support for your projects
  • Regularly communicate the vision and status of your data science projects, ensuring that accurate expectations are set and met across all levels of partners
What Were Looking For:

Basic Qualifications:
  • Bachelors Degree in Math, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field; or equivalent experience
  • 1 7+ yrs experience in a Data Science or other advanced data analytics role
  • Shown success in using large amounts of data to solve analytical problems
  • Strong English-speaking and writing skills required
  • Familiarity with data analysis scripting languages, such as Python or R (Python preferred)
  • Knowledge of advanced statistical data analysis and modeling
  • Experience with data mining, machine learning, natural language processing, and data visualization
  • Working knowledge of traditional data storage, relational databases, SQL, and ETL tools
  • Exposure to technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL data stores
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of business, operational and technical partners
  • Ability to communicate complex mathematical models and processes in straightforward, non-technical language
  • Occasional travel is required.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Graduate Degree in Math, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field; or equivalent experience
  • Familiarity with conventional software development languages (Scala, JavaScript, C#, Java, etc.) a plus
About S&P Global Market Intelligence

At S&P Global Market Intelligence, we know that not all information is importantsome of it is vital. Accurate, deep and insightful.
